snippet: It is impressive that prosecutors known as the “grandchildren generation” have opened investigations into dozens of long-dormant cases.
abstract: Editorial supports Germany's opening of dozens of investigations into long-dormant cases of Nazi death-camp guards suspected of culpable roles in Holocaust; says that effort is important for pursuing justice delayed and for filling out record of monstrous time that is fast receding into history.
lead_paragraph: It is impressive that prosecutors known as the “grandchildren generation” have opened investigations into dozens of long-dormant cases.

headline.main: Germany’s Pursuit of Death Camp Guards
headline.print_headline: Germany’s Pursuit of Death Camp Guards

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
